s.text: A WP reader notes that in the paper's recent reprise of three 20-year-old stories about Skylab, none of the stories gave the same weight for the space craft.
The paper adds that in a jailhouse interview Monday night, he told a TV reporter that he had dreamed about killing women for 30 years.
The suspect had previously hidden evidence from investigators but had also written them an anonymous letter leading them to a body they couldn't find.
In other words, the folks who have benefited least from the upswing in salaries or the stock market also benefit least from the Republican tax stance.
